message.body: Hello World.

I cloned and started this chatroom to serve as a place to give ZeroNet a sense of community / activity /... and a freaking pulse! In all reality, I was just getting tired of quiet and ghost like ZeroNet is :)
Well hi!
It's a live chat, but it probably won't feel super "Alive" until we have various people in here chatting. One step at a time though :D
Logging for the night. I'll be back tomorrow :)
Hey!
Doing alright, yourself?
Well, I welcome you both! This here is my little attempt to breath life into ZeroNet's community presence
Oh crap, is that out already?! I need to make a calendar full of release dates haha
Welp, I know what I'm doing tomorrow!
That's how secret ZeroNet is, you forget you're here haha
But rather, Chatrooms are new to ZeroNet, so I don't blame you :)
And Aiden, you don't know Halloween 4? The old horror slasher flicks with Michael Myers?
A good movie will do that!
You definitely need to check those movies out, they pretty much shaped that culture
That's true, pretty cheesy now, but most old movies feel that way nowadays haha
I can't even remember what all happens in 3 honestly, if that says anything
Now you're talking my language! Huge fan of the Metal Gear Solid Series :D
And yea, my aunt was a huge fan of the Halloween series but after 3, she pretty much abandoned that ship
It's like Half-Life 3... except the opposite. You wish it DIDN'T exist xD
So that explains why my cat kept failing her jumps today....
Oh man, yea, I enjoyed that show the first time through, but now it's cringe worthy
Welcome Konar!
... uhhh, well, i'm working with 6 :)
Yep, 3 on top, 3 on bottom, all attached to my work / gaming rig
I normally wouldn't have this many, but it really helps with my job so I went all in
I stuck with 3 for years and was fine. Some days, I wish I only had 3, 6 gets overwhelming sometimes >.>
Ain't that the truth! My laptop pales in comparison experience wise
Same here actually, running an alienware laptop
The blaze, nice! Did you see Razer's new Razer Valerie?
Crap, *blade
it looks really really sexy.... but man, how "plausible" is that? The battery life alone would be completely gone
Why do you have a blade if you aren't interested in gaming? Isn't that the blade's purpose?
ohhh, I see
I'm an avid gamer, so it only made sense (I guess lol) to have a gaming laptop and desktop
Kind of sucks though, cause I use my laptop for work too, which means I need to carry that brick with me all over the city. Pretty much how I stay fit xD
haha sorry!
And nice! the better the comp, the better that rendering time is
Gaming rigs are definitely getting cheaper and cheaper, so that's really nice!~
My laptop was about $3k and desktop about $1,8k (with another 500-ish for the new monitors)
that's roughly what my budget for another comp is too, but i'm still about a year or so out from need to get another rig built
Versus current line CPU's like Intel's I7 and etc
That's a good break down
If your laptop was a walmart cheapie by, then that rig will definitely be noticeably faster. Walmart laptops are pretty low end
*buy
Specially now-a-days. For awhile, they weren't known for the longest health life, but it's gotten way better in the last year or so
So yea, this rig will blow your laptop out of the water almost 100% guarantee
Windows is roughly another $100 - $200 depending on what vendor you go through and if they have a sale going on
and depending on what version of windows you are getting
Know how that is, my cat constantly jumps up on my keyboard and just lays there
Hello Nishikinomaki!
Agreed on that
Windows 10 is kind of a privacy nightmare to be fair :)
Essentially it's the idea of only getting what you really need so you can help cut costs ya know?
well that escalated haha
2 TB?! Well damn.. i'm slacking haha
For real, what do you do with that much?
Welp friends, I'm going to log for the night, got work in a couple hours. I appreciate the chat and that you both took the time to check my project out :)
haha sorry, tomorrow will suck if I don't get some Z
Goodnight!
Hey there!
Coffee run brb
And back
HI :D
haha hey there!
It's going, in the middle of work so I might not be as responsive >.>
Why terrible?
Can't you finish it today?
lol never to be seen again
You'll just have to make up your own ending!
Did we lose aiden?
good point, welp, now you have something to do after work! :D
Aiden messaged me asking how to increase the identity address limit, it's keep them from chatting on here now.
any ideas?
Yea, i'm about to hit limit too, not sure how to increase that limit or get rid of it
researching that now
Let me look at the json files for this site first and see what the problem is. Then we' know whatwe need to do
What does your limit say now?
See that zero in the top right of the screen? drag that left, then look at "identity address", next to it should be a limit number
Welcome back aiden! Sooooo sorry about that, new to all this :/
hi!
there is size limit and then identity address, next to identity it should say "limit used: X / X"
Glad we got that situated!

That's what mine says too, so, awesome! The limit is the size a person can post as one identity before the signing fails. Not 100% sure why that's a thing aside from forcing you to switch up aliases perhaps
I'll probably have to purge the chat from time to time to keep the site size down
You can change addresses yea, but switching back to your previous address won't get rid of the limit until the chat is purged, since all your old messages would still be there
What a learning curve haha
Well hello there!
I wonder if I can set a limit before the site just purges itself lol
How are you Klew?
Yep, when I change the files, it sends the update notification to whoever is also seeding this site and then updates all of them too
I do love me some Metal Gear <3
Yep, it's one big decentralized network, in all its grandeur
And way prettier than freenet = win win
Freenet feels really dead these days, it's like it's prime has passed </3
Yea, ZeroNet has a ways to go, but it's on the up, where freenet is on the down.
I created this live chat with the hopes to bring a more lively presence to ZeroNet, cause I know there are people around, they just don't have one central spot to chat and gather
Well freenet had implemented some solutions against the CP issue so it got better, but in general it feels archaic, has slow seeding speeds and the community has flaked off a lot
That's true, there's no immediate understanding of zeroNet and how it can be used, so the less adventurous and ambitious people tend to pass it up since they can't see its potential
which is the benefit of the de-centralized p2p, you have the choice of which connections you want to see and etc. All for IPFS
but the approach of simply banning cp is faced with a lot of backlash, because in doing so, you usher in censorship which, well, then skies the limits
Aww, I appreciate people actually using it! This is a proof of concept that the community wanted a solution like this :)
in ipfs, yea
As it has been said, the right solution isn't banning it, the right solution is to give them a place of their own, as to prevent its spread into other channels where it isn't necessarily wanted
Mixing that with ability to ban their public keys, we get closer to making the CP barrier more effective
What difficulty is he playing on, Aiden? If it's european extreme... then vamp truly is a bitch to fight haha
You can get hit a couple of times by vamp in EE without dying, but him hitting you like twice is equivalent to 6 - 8 times on normal or something like that. The battle drags on a lot longer though
IPFS is mainly for file storage where ZeroNet employs active database / website structure hosting (on p2p network infrastructure)
I've seen a couple of manga zites offering up their content for those who have ipfs installed, so zeroNet and ipfs can actually be married together when neeeded
alt+tab breaking?
And EE takes a lot of patience, I got soooo frustrated with it >.>
European Extreme ( difficulty level on Metal Gear Solid 4 )
haha
...was a matter of time :)
Man, look at all that work i'm not getting done :(
Nah, just need to focus a bit more. I design and build websites for a local company. We have a deadline coming up so I need to get a couple of these mobile bugs worked out
Def agree on that
just depends on the application really
Gonna focus for a bit, need to get this done asap,
!lurking
You could always clone the site and check out the files in your dir. As for seeing a sites log or files it is using, i'm not sure how that would be achieved

Not 100% sure actually, I think the zeroLab blog mentioned a manual way to clone a site, but i'm not sure of what that entails. I've just been using the clone button haha. Would definitely be interested if you find that answer
haha, fair point
that's how you get a fair and even world ehh?
haha man oh man
Sexy!
I feel ya :D haha
Eeek, yea that's costly lol
Try working for 14 hrs :P
Welp, i'm gonna be gone most of the night, so have a good day everyone! :D
Much appreciated! :D
Yo!
Just learned that ZeroNet has a mobile application now, pretty stoked about that!~
Haha I learned about it from your ZeroMe! :D
Nice
Good luck with getting that stream going, the latency on custom solutions always drives me crazy haha
That's about right haha
ohh, yea, that blows
You are trying to network 2 VM'
VM's, you were already playing with fire haha
Hello frustration!
Oh shit, this is escalating fast lol
hahahaha, good ol stable windows!
Oh man, good luck with all that noise :P
Rough night, friend. Perhaps you should of finished that Halloween movie instead
Hey hyperbeam!
Welcome Geared
Getting VM's to talk can be quite the nightmare, but good on ya for trying anyhow :)
vm's stands for Virtual Machines
Yea, that's one way to do it. Got a couple of friends who went that route
I'm doing alright, really really tired though. probably gonna log within the next 10 mins or so
Yourself?
Psssh, wish I had the ability to stay up all the time. I'd get so much work done and finally get caught up :P
And on that note, i'm passing out. Night everyone o/
Hello!
How goes?
Same here, craazy cold
0'f here and 2ft of snow here. Not a fan of cold xD
haha right there with ya :D
Does it work now? All the ZeroTube type websites never load for me

I'll probably add my zeroMail to the top so people can send me suggestions
Yo
Ironically, I had pizza for dinner too :)
I could use an energy drink right about now :P
*gives bag of candy* win win
lol uhhh?
classic!
hahaha
is that protecting or protecting from the haters?
oh really? working on this end
Something change in your connection or settings?
Hmm, not really sure then, mine's updating almost instantaneously on both my comp and my viewing computer
Interesting, not sure what would cause that unless something local to your machine was causing the issue (hogging the bandwidth and / or etc)
broke it?
whaa? I can see all your text
And back
Clicked on some of the links and got to the magnet links. When I hit the back button, I get a gateway forbidden error
You and me both :P
Lol ON IT... some other time. I'm too tired to code without errors right now xD
seriously? well damn haha
hahah then I'm also responsible for doing it with integrity, which isn't in the cards currently. I'M DOING YOU A FAVOR BY NOT DOING IT! :D
Damn, my weakness
I'm assuming you are now monoloquing with the Clowns, I'd say the same thing to one lol
You do you :P
Welp, i'm passing out. Night Krona!~

The weather man was like "it's going to be nice out today!".... guess he missed the part where the temperature is - 4....
And welcome back :)
Hey aiden, good to see ya again!
True that
me too, my food isn't here yet >.>
I used opera which to grab  a link and it worked perfectly sirenyc
haha progress :P

Ahh, use steam to check game integrity
that creepy ass game
Hate working on the weekend >.>
Yea for sure.  We are currently on a grind, so I've worked the last 7 weekends but hopefully, we wrap up this week and I finally start my vacation :)
Oh man, I thought GDQ was next weekend! huge fan of the speed runner communitiy

Games Done Quick, it's a week long twitch stream of people speed running various games, usually aiming to beat world records but they also stream to get donations for charity. They are sitting at 58k raised so far
And failing?

Chatrooms are relatively new to zeronet, so we don't have IRC integration yet or anything like that. I started this general chat to gives us the "ground zero" so other people can then start making niche topic chatrooms. So be my guest, clone away :D
Also, welcome Movax!
I'd post the GDQ link but external network links are generally frowned upon for the most part :P
it really was, yea!
There was awesome glitching happening on Ocarina of Time earlier
It's weird seeing them in 2 different locations. Ones literally in a boss fight while the other is shopping xD
Awwwwww that sucks
#Fact

Do they not have any vsync options turned on?
Now kids lol
That was intense!
I'd almost consider a lot of the zites (this one included) in Alpha actually, so yea, version control and etc is a bit far away. However, it's definitely on my list of features I want to include!
hahahaha, I like this guy

There was someone sitting in the front row of the audience using a vr headset during shovel knights. How can you justify stealing a good seat away from someone when you are already as personal as the experience can get with your headset?
Nice
English, the great copycat :)
That was one of my theories actually: 1 - works there and is somewhat "showing off" that they have VR"
2 - partner to GDC, or 3 - audience member who wanted to be seen :P
Oh by all means, with 110k people watching, i'm sure the theories run wild haha
Like most knowledge, if you don't use it, you lose it. I too once tried to pick-up japanese but the lack of having any way to really practice with another person or environment, I strayed </3
I've always wanted to learn Hawaiin!
Sounds like tongue twisters too :P
Noticed that :P

It's truly crazy what impact a language can have on a society. It is the foundation for thoughts and ideas. When you take a langauge away, you also take away unique ways to see and experience the world
MEGAMAN!
Both desk and lap at 1920

he just needs to sneeze on them or get someone to "accidentally" fall in front of the opponents lol
seriously

actually, there is an active group called "Shining Force III translation project" that are working on those very translations. I'm just impatient haha

delicious delicious windows :)
near the top left of the chat element, there is a right arrow icon, click that
if you hover over the stream, you can go into theater mode using the bottom right icon, which then makes it more apparent how to close the chat window

highly recommend the MGS series Aiden!

... is this really happeneing?
i'm disappointed.
hahaha

This is the most cringe worthy run i've ever seen... ever

He didn't kill him, just put him to sleep
With most bosses in MGS2, if you put them to sleep, you can get their dog tags
But yea, same difference :P
And MGS2 reaaaaaally didn't have the best A.I. out there xD
even some A.I. can't handle binary logic!
Sounds like you have a calling lol
By all means, knowledge is power no matter where you get it :)
He was tanking fortunes rail gun shots to the face earlier. TOTALLY OP, sign the nerf petition :P
"there is a high chance I might screw this up"... you didn't even have to say it at this point..
he really shouldn't, it's not very helpful
He has a diving mask yea
Raiden got into the oil rig via a secret underwater injection so his presence wouldn't be known, thus he had to swim through a special hole in one of the struts
their radio broadcasts are actually via encrypted channels using the nanomachines in their suits, thus their radio broadcasts are really hard to pick up on and etc
Oh, i'm not saying their "usage" of the tech in the game is actually logically sound, i'm just telling you what they explain haha
He's actually a grown up Jack the Ripper, but yea, he does have gene-modifcation, lots of VR training, and then later, gets REEALLY modified haha (RE: the Raiden Game in the series)
But he is also wearing a nanomachine suit
Metal Gear Solid has done a lot to really try and explain just about everything that is and that's going on. I really respect it for that
haha, they don't require you to actually choke her, she'll get on the elevator once you move the bugs out of her path. I assume he did that for run specifically
Like I said, huge fan of Metal Gear Solid up till Hideo left :)
2 and 4 are my top favorites, with peace walker and 3 being my least fav
The Snake that you play in MGS V isn't actually the same as the solid snake you are seeing in MGS2. In the timeline, MGS2 comes way after MGSV
I watched someone streaming their speedrun just the other day, and they were super skilled, knew timing down to the T, knew every little game secret and etc. It was pretty 180 from this
Both Solid and Liquid snake are clones of Big Boss in the Les Enfant Terribles project
Honestly, even though they are playing my favorite game... I wouldn't waste my time sitting there either.
Yep, right below :)
hahaha
I love all the codec calls you get down here and specifically in this tunnel xD They are amazing and random as hell!
I need scissors, 61!!
At all the interviews and conferences, people would always get him to repeat those lines actually <3
that was probably the best thing he's done so far...
Yea, it's quite unbecoming
omg seriously... this fucking guy....

The game can be a lot of fun with the right speed runner... but he is making me uninterested in my favorite game... UGH! But what gets me is that he's asking the GDQ staff to cater to him on a game that isn't nearly as precise as he's making it seem, he just lacks a certain set of skills
Not sure how the game queue works, I figured it was volunteer based with some invitiations specially sent. So he would of had to sign-up somehow
Well, it would have to be a lot of dummy accounts cause that chat is moving fast lol
Wonder if they have a comments / suggestions form somewhere? That way we know they would review it. Dummy accounts would have more effect there
...that should disqualify him lol
immediately messes up on boss :P
That's true
I'm looking at catching The Legend of Korra, most of the mega-mans, Halo 2 and then batman :)
That's a really empty room...
I'll be at my other office tomorrow so I'll see how that goes. If the day isn't full of meetings then I can hang in channel. Else I'll be back on Tuesday
Lucky :)
haha, i'm pretty safe about my security habits, I can pull a lot off :)
I helped setup the network so I have a couple comps off the intranet and safe :P
But I also work remotely 4 of 7 days so that comes with all the privileges I need
Goodnight Rythyrix, till next time :)
I'm probably heading out too so I can was that bad MGS2 run from my mind
*so I can get that
Catch everyone later o/
Hello!
Monday, you prevail at sucking

Lots of meetings with cranky and untranslatable clients really, wears ya down after awhile. Then had to run home to let the maintenance guy in... who never showed, so now my project is going to be late unless I work all night tonight. And here I am lol
All professional, all the deadlines are client set, and we can't afford to miss them at the moment
Nah, it's nothing I can't handle, just don't enjoy my evenings being taken from me, keeps me from winding down which eventually leads to burn out.
Right there with ya, Aiden. Client work = ew.
We are all laborers to some system, no judgement here :)
"This" as in ZeroNet, or as in societies current paradigm/chapter?
Just ensuring, cause society is feeling pretty 1984/BNW right about now lol. It's a weird and hypernormal world out there </3. ZeroNet definitely has the 90's feel, that's a good way to put it :)
If anything, ZeroNet / Tor / Freenet / VPN's / IPFS / encrypted messaging and etc all give us hope in a world that often seems lacking. That I can get behind :)
Aiden, I did see an adult (assuming you are) dating zite on here, not sure it caters towards any fetishes or etc but worth looking at. If not, you can start your own via cloning it
Chrome is notorious for its memory leaks and resource hogging, definitely try firefox or some other light weight browser. I've had some decent luck running Vivaldi on a little $300 walmart laptop
HI KRONA! :D
how big was it?
But you have access to zeronet?
Ahhh, nice. and yea... that explains the poor performance back then too lol
Why would they give you computer access at all? What captor allows outside communication?
Welp, you can fix that anytime you want if you have access to the internet via tor relays :)
Assuming you aren't behind VPN's and relays that are masking / changing your IP's
Not sure what map you are looking at, but they don't usually disclose other peoples location or connectivity points
I had assumed he used an actual "what's my location" website that pinpoints only your location. That map isn't 100% accurate, nor does it tell you much beside a relative position in a country :P
Also, that map is only related to the peer network connected to this Zite in particular, not ZeroNet as a whole
totally for blue hair!
It would seem there is only 4 people in Australia connected to zeronet. I know that isnt true since I know 2 people there who both run a couple versions of it themselves to seed sites xD
There you got, that's a unique way to do it. I'm sure Krona knows what country / state / city he's in or near, so that alone would get us a lot closer than using a dot on an undefined globe
* go
The map doesn't show any dots in south canada on default or here
What kind of Zite? Welcome to clone this one if ya need a starter
gotcha, simple enough.

it says 2 peers connected

wb!

I'd go to the office or front desk and tell them the room you are looking for AND the specific class with what teacher. That way they have 3 pieces of information to work with instead of just a room
And they didn't know the teacher or the class name?
E-mail the teacher back saying you've gone to the front desk and asked building administrators for help but no one can find the classroom. See if she can do something more to help you get there

Well, though we can't stop CP, we can find a way to give them their own "place" as to keep them from spreading their content elsewhere on the Zero network. Similiar to how freenet countered CP postings
Welcome back Rythyrix!

I mean, we have an ochan porn board. and we all know what is there. So equally, have a spot notable for CP and hope it acts as a magnet that pulls the CP posters to it and away from the rest of the distribution zites. It's a theory anyhow, but the one thing you can't do is ban it. That opens up the pandora's box of censorship. A box you can't close afterwards
Oh, i'll add that to my bug list. Thakns for telling me :)

Well, yes and no. You'll notice that even Spam doesn't get deleted. The point is, that if you don't like something, you just don't open it or etc. But to ban something or "censor" it opens the can of worms of "who says if something is right or wrong", it only scales up from there and etc. but yea, there is no perfect solution really.
None the less, this is and will always be an uncensored network. being p2p helps establish that as well
Sure, they came in here and posted like crazy. it was annoying... but their voice is equal to everyone elses.
localized censorship based on the user is definitely a more responsible approach because no longer is it a blanket solution, but instead tailored to the individual.

Naturally that user can make shell accounts and keep posting making the blacklist a chore, but the fact its a personal descision takes any blame off the network and is in turn seen as a benefit of the platform.
And sure, but this is the grey area that keeps these networks going because it's really a matter of what society can come to terms with
Never forget the 69 part :P
Aww, I always feel like that the day before going back to work

Sure, but again, that's the grey zone. Do you give the person the ability to handle the problem, or does the network take it on as their own. If the network is responsible, then such a problem in turn can become the networks downfall. IE: we won't get much of a traffic surge if the common clearnet user hears about how much CP you'll be exposed to for using zeronet. If you leave the responsiblity to the user, then the stakes can be high enough to lose the attention of the common user. Such as, using freenet knowing you may accidentally seed CP or etc
but yea, what's the right answer? Well, that's what these platforms try to solve in their own way. Note how different freenet is from ZeroNet and etc
"No more work"
haha poor aiden
True, and that's a big benefit of Zeronet routing through the tor network. It's one of the many solutions to the liability of the content distributed.
